member.name: T:AD.IO.Standard.ExtractZipFileExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to extract entries from a .

member.name: M:AD.IO.Standard.ExtractZipFileExtensions.ExtractZipFile(AD.IO.Standard.ZipFilePath,AD.IO.Standard.FilePath,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Extracts a single file from the . An exception is thrown if more than one file is found in the zip archive.
member.param: The zip file to open.
The file path to which the extracted entry is saved.
If true, the file path is overwritten.

member.param: The zip file to open.

The message written to STDOUT upon successful completion.

member.summary: Saves a zip file to from the response stream of the .

member.name: M:AD.IO.Standard.GetZipFileExtensions.TryGetZipFile(AD.IO.Standard.UrlPath,AD.IO.Standard.ZipFilePath,System.Boolean,System.String)

A message written to stdout upon completion.
